title: Kuradashi: E-Commerce Website that Combines Food Loss with Social Good | TOKYO UPDATES [The Official ... - TOKYO UPDATES（トーキョー・アップデーツ）
summary: KURADASHI, a Japanese e-commerce company, tackles food waste by selling discounted food products nearing their best-by dates. They partner with manufacturers and producers to prevent food loss and donate a portion of their sales to social action organizations. KURADASHI aims to become a sustainability leader in Tokyo and beyond, with their unique model promoting social good and reducing environmental impact.
product_or_process: Kuradashi e-commerce website and food waste reduction model
likely_naics_codes: ['454110 - Electronic Shopping and Mail-Order Houses', '445110 - Supermarkets and Other Grocery (except Convenience) Stores', '453110 - Grocery Stores', '445210 - Convenience Stores']
greenwashing: The article does not suggest that Kuradashi's practices are misleading or that they are engaging in greenwashing.
